00028 const char *XDSO::s_trace_names[] = {

00032 XDSO::XDSO(const char *name, bool runtime,
00033            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00034            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00035            const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,

00046     m_vFullScale2(create<XComboNode>("VFullScale2", false, true)),
00047     m_vFullScale3(create<XComboNode>("VFullScale3", false, true)),
00048     m_vFullScale4(create<XComboNode>("VFullScale4", false, true)),

00052     m_vOffset4(create<XDoubleNode>("VOffset4", false)),

00055     m_trace1(create<XComboNode>("Trace1", false)),

00097     m_form->m_btnForceTrigger->setIcon(

00100     m_form->m_numTrigPos->setRange(0.0, 100.0, 1.0, true);

00104     m_form->resize( QSize(m_form->width(), 400) );
00105 
00106     singleSequence()->value(true);
00107     firBandWidth()->value(1000.0);
00108     firCenterFreq()->value(.0);
00109     firSharpness()->value(4.5);

00111     m_lsnOnCondChanged = firEnabled()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00112         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onCondChanged);
00113     firBandWidth()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00114     firCenterFreq()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00115     firSharpness()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00116   
00117     {
00118         const char *modes[] = {"Never", "Averaging", "Sequence", 0L};
00119         for(const char **mode = &modes[0]; *mode; mode++)
00120             fetchMode()->add(*mode);
00121     }
00122     fetchMode()->value(FETCHMODE_SEQ);
00123   
00124     average()->setUIEnabled(false);
00125     singleSequence()->setUIEnabled(false);
00126 //  fetchMode()->setUIEnabled(false);
00127     timeWidth()->setUIEnabled(false);

00138     vOffset3()->setUIEnabled(false);
00139     vOffset4()->setUIEnabled(false);
00140     forceTrigger()->setUIEnabled(false);
00141     recordLength()->setUIEnabled(false);
00142   
00143     m_waveForm->setColCount(4, s_trace_names);
00144     m_waveForm->graph()->persistence()->value(0);
00145     m_waveForm->clear();
00146 }

00154 void
00155 XDSO::start()
00156 {
00157     m_thread.reset(new XThread<XDSO>(shared_from_this(), &XDSO::execute));
00158     m_thread->resume();
00159   
00160 //  trace1()->setUIEnabled(false);
00161 //  trace2()->setUIEnabled(false);
00162 //  trace3()->setUIEnabled(false);
00163 //  trace4()->setUIEnabled(false);
00164   
00165     average()->setUIEnabled(true);
00166     singleSequence()->setUIEnabled(true);
00167     timeWidth()->setUIEnabled(true);
00168     trigSource()->setUIEnabled(true);
00169     trigPos()->setUIEnabled(true);
00170     trigLevel()->setUIEnabled(true);
00171     trigFalling()->setUIEnabled(true);
00172     vFullScale1()->setUIEnabled(true);
00173     vFullScale2()->setUIEnabled(true);
00174     vFullScale3()->setUIEnabled(true);
00175     vFullScale4()->setUIEnabled(true);
00176     vOffset1()->setUIEnabled(true);
00177     vOffset2()->setUIEnabled(true);
00178     vOffset3()->setUIEnabled(true);
00179     vOffset4()->setUIEnabled(true);
00180     forceTrigger()->setUIEnabled(true);
00181     recordLength()->setUIEnabled(true);

00213 unsigned int
00214 XDSO::lengthRecorded() const
00215 {
00216     return m_wavesRecorded.size() / numChannelsRecorded();
00217 }
00218 const double *
00219 XDSO::waveRecorded(unsigned int ch) const
00220 {
00221     return &m_wavesRecorded[lengthRecorded() * ch];
00222 }
00223 unsigned int
00224 XDSO::lengthDisp() const
00225 {
00226     return m_wavesDisp.size() / numChannelsDisp();
00227 }
00228 double *
00229 XDSO::waveDisp(unsigned int ch)
00230 {
00231     return &m_wavesDisp[lengthDisp() * ch];
00232 }
00233 
00234 void
00235 XDSO::visualize()
00236 {
00237     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_dispMutex);
00238   
00239     m_statusPrinter->clear();
00240   
00241 //  if(!time()) {
00242 //      m_waveForm->clear();
00243 //      return;
00244 //  }
00245     const unsigned int num_channels = numChannelsDisp();
00246     if(!num_channels) {
00247         m_waveForm->clear();
00248         return;
00249     }
00250     const unsigned int length = lengthDisp();
00251     { XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*m_waveForm);
00252     m_waveForm->setColCount(num_channels + 1, s_trace_names);
00253     if(m_waveForm->numPlots() != num_channels) {
00254         m_waveForm->clearPlots();
00255         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < num_channels; i++) {
00256             m_waveForm->insertPlot(s_trace_names[i + 1], 0, i + 1);
00257         }
00258         m_waveForm->axisy()->label()->value(i18n("Traces [V]"));
00259     }
00260     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < num_channels; i++) {
00261         m_waveForm->plot(i)->drawPoints()->value(false);
00262     }
00263           
00264     m_waveForm->setRowCount(length);
00265     
00266     double *times = m_waveForm->cols(0);
00267     double tint = timeIntervalDisp();
00268     double t = -trigPosDisp() * tint;
00269     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00270         *times++ = t;
00271         t += tint;
00272     }
00273         
00274     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < num_channels; i++) {
00275         memcpy(m_waveForm->cols(i + 1), waveDisp(i), length * sizeof(double));
00276     }
00277     }
00278 }
00279 
00280 void *
00281 XDSO::execute(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00282 {
00283     XTime time_awared = XTime::now();
00284     int last_count = 0;
00285   
00286     m_lsnOnAverageChanged = average()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00287         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onAverageChanged);
00288     m_lsnOnSingleChanged = singleSequence()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00289         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onSingleChanged);
00290     m_lsnOnTimeWidthChanged = timeWidth()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00291         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTimeWidthChanged);
00292     m_lsnOnTrigSourceChanged = trigSource()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00293         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrigSourceChanged);
00294     m_lsnOnTrigPosChanged = trigPos()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00295         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrigPosChanged);
00296     m_lsnOnTrigLevelChanged = trigLevel()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00297         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrigLevelChanged);
00298     m_lsnOnTrigFallingChanged = trigFalling()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00299         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrigFallingChanged);
00300     m_lsnOnTrace1Changed = trace1()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00301         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrace1Changed);
00302     m_lsnOnTrace2Changed = trace2()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00303         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrace2Changed);
00304     m_lsnOnTrace3Changed = trace3()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00305         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrace3Changed);
00306     m_lsnOnTrace4Changed = trace4()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00307         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrace4Changed);
00308     m_lsnOnVFullScale1Changed = vFullScale1()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00309         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onVFullScale1Changed);
00310     m_lsnOnVFullScale2Changed = vFullScale2()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00311         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onVFullScale2Changed);
00312     m_lsnOnVFullScale3Changed = vFullScale3()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00313         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onVFullScale3Changed);
00314     m_lsnOnVFullScale4Changed = vFullScale4()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00315         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onVFullScale4Changed);
00316     m_lsnOnVOffset1Changed = vOffset1()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00317         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onVOffset1Changed);
00318     m_lsnOnVOffset2Changed = vOffset2()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00319         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onVOffset2Changed);
00320     m_lsnOnVOffset3Changed = vOffset3()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00321         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onVOffset3Changed);
00322     m_lsnOnVOffset4Changed = vOffset4()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00323         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onVOffset4Changed);
00324     m_lsnOnForceTriggerTouched = forceTrigger()->onTouch().connectWeak(
00325         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onForceTriggerTouched);
00326     m_lsnOnRecordLengthChanged = recordLength()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00327         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onRecordLengthChanged);
00328 
00329     while(!terminated) {
00330         const int fetch_mode = *fetchMode();
00331         if(!fetch_mode || (fetch_mode == FETCHMODE_NEVER)) {
00332             msecsleep(100);
00333             continue;
00334         }
00335         std::deque<XString> channels;
00336         {
00337             XString chstr = trace1()->to_str();
00338             if(!chstr.empty())
00339                 channels.push_back(chstr);
00340             chstr = trace2()->to_str();
00341             if(!chstr.empty())
00342                 channels.push_back(chstr);
00343             chstr = trace3()->to_str();
00344             if(!chstr.empty())
00345                 channels.push_back(chstr);
00346             chstr = trace4()->to_str();
00347             if(!chstr.empty())
00348                 channels.push_back(chstr);
00349         }
00350         if(!channels.size()) {
00351             statusPrinter()->printMessage(getLabel() + " " + i18n("Select traces!."));
00352             msecsleep(500);
00353             continue;
00354         }
00355         
00356         bool seq_busy = false;
00357         int count;
00358         try {
00359             count = acqCount(&seq_busy);
00360             if(!count) {
00361                 time_awared = XTime::now();
00362                 last_count = 0;
00363                 msecsleep(10);
00364                 continue;
00365             }
00366             if(count == last_count) {
00367             //Nothing happened after the last reading.
00368                 msecsleep(10);
00369                 continue;
00370             }
00371             if(fetch_mode == FETCHMODE_SEQ) {
00372                 if(*singleSequence() && seq_busy) {
00373                     msecsleep(10);
00374                     continue;
00375                 }
00376             }
00377         }
00378         catch (XKameError& e) {
00379             e.print(getLabel());
00380             continue;
00381         }
00382       
00383         clearRaw();
00384         // try/catch exception of communication errors
00385         try {
00386             getWave(channels);
00387         }
00388         catch (XDriver::XSkippedRecordError&) {
00389             continue;
00390         }
00391         catch (XKameError &e) {
00392             e.print(getLabel());
00393             continue;
00394         }
00395       
00396         m_rawDisplayOnly = (*singleSequence() && seq_busy);
00397 
00398         finishWritingRaw(time_awared, XTime::now());
00399           
00400         last_count =  count;
00401         
00402         if(*singleSequence() && !seq_busy) {
00403             last_count = 0;
00404             time_awared = XTime::now();
00405             // try/catch exception of communication errors
00406             try {
00407                 startSequence();
00408             }
00409             catch (XKameError &e) {
00410                 e.print(getLabel());
00411                 continue;
00412             }
00413         }
00414     }
00415     m_rawDisplayOnly = false;
00416 
00417     m_lsnOnAverageChanged.reset();
00418     m_lsnOnSingleChanged.reset();
00419     m_lsnOnTimeWidthChanged.reset();
00420     m_lsnOnTrigSourceChanged.reset();
00421     m_lsnOnTrigPosChanged.reset();
00422     m_lsnOnTrigLevelChanged.reset();
00423     m_lsnOnTrigFallingChanged.reset();
00424     m_lsnOnVFullScale1Changed.reset();
00425     m_lsnOnVFullScale2Changed.reset();
00426     m_lsnOnVFullScale3Changed.reset();
00427     m_lsnOnVFullScale4Changed.reset();
00428     m_lsnOnTrace1Changed.reset();
00429     m_lsnOnTrace2Changed.reset();
00430     m_lsnOnTrace3Changed.reset();
00431     m_lsnOnTrace4Changed.reset();
00432     m_lsnOnVOffset1Changed.reset();
00433     m_lsnOnVOffset2Changed.reset();
00434     m_lsnOnVOffset3Changed.reset();
00435     m_lsnOnVOffset4Changed.reset();
00436     m_lsnOnForceTriggerTouched.reset();
00437     m_lsnOnRecordLengthChanged.reset();
00438                             
00439     afterStop();
00440 
00441     return NULL;
00442 }
00443 
00444 void
00445 XDSO::onCondChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00446 {
00447 //  readLockRecord();
00448     visualize();
00449 //  readUnlockRecord();
00450 }
00451 void
00452 XDSO::setParameters(unsigned int channels, double startpos, double interval, unsigned int length)
00453 {
00454     m_numChannelsDisp = channels;
00455     m_wavesDisp.resize(channels * length, 0.0);
00456     m_trigPosDisp = -startpos / interval;
00457     m_timeIntervalDisp = interval;
00458 }
00459 void
00460 XDSO::convertRawToDisp() throw (XRecordError&) {
00461     convertRaw();
00462     
00463     unsigned int num_channels = numChannelsDisp();
00464     if(!num_channels) {
00465         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00466     }
00467     if(*firEnabled()) {
00468         double  bandwidth = *firBandWidth()*1000.0*timeIntervalDisp();
00469         double fir_sharpness = *firSharpness();
00470         if(fir_sharpness < 4.0)
00471             m_statusPrinter->printWarning(i18n("Too small number of taps for FIR filter."));
00472         int taps = std::min((int)lrint(2 * fir_sharpness / bandwidth), 5000);
00473         double center = *firCenterFreq() * 1000.0 * timeIntervalDisp();
00474         if(!m_fir || (taps != m_fir->taps()) || (bandwidth != m_fir->bandWidth()) || (center != m_fir->centerFreq()))
00475             m_fir.reset(new FIR(taps, bandwidth, center));
00476         unsigned int length = lengthDisp();
00477         std::vector<double> buf(length);
00478         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < num_channels; i++) {
00479             m_fir->exec(waveDisp(i), &buf[0], length);
00480             memcpy(waveDisp(i), &buf[0], length * sizeof(double));
00481         }
00482     }
00483 }
00484 void
00485 XDSO::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&) {
00486     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_dispMutex);
00487 
00488     convertRawToDisp();
00489 
00490     if(m_rawDisplayOnly) {
00491         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00492     }
00493 //    std::fill(m_wavesRecorded.begin(), m_wavesRecorded.end(), 0.0);
00494     m_numChannelsRecorded = m_numChannelsDisp;
00495     m_wavesRecorded.resize(m_wavesDisp.size());
00496     m_trigPosRecorded = m_trigPosDisp;
00497     m_timeIntervalRecorded = m_timeIntervalDisp;
00498     memcpy(&m_wavesRecorded[0], &m_wavesDisp[0], m_wavesDisp.size() * sizeof(double));
00499 }
